instructions: Heat oil in a wok. Add garlic and ginger, stir for 30 seconds. Add broccoli and carrots, stir fry for 5 minutes. Add soy sauce and sesame oil, toss well. Serve over rice.

Cook pasta according to package. Heat olive oil, add garlic and cook 1 min. Add crushed tomatoes, oregano, salt, pepper. Simmer 15 minutes. Toss with pasta and top with basil.

Heat oil, add onion and cook until soft. Add garlic, ginger, curry powder, cook 2 min. Add tomatoes and coconut milk, simmer 10 min. Add chickpeas and spinach, cook until spinach wilts. Serve with rice.
